page.title: 02MINERS STRIKE-A CHILDS VIEW
page.content: I am ten years old and my dad is a miner.On March 13th my Dad went on strike along with all his workmates.When we got home and told us the news we didn't think it would last long.But ..Spring turned into Summer and we didn't go on outings or holidays at all.As Christmas approached and the colder months set in my mum and dad got more and more unhappy because we didn't have any coal to burn...At Christmas we hardly got any presents and my Mum and Dad had only a bottle of wine to share.In January my Dad started talking about going back to work...On Jan. 24th he went back...all those that had the courage to go back....got called scab, and even me and my brother..But we're not bothered my Dad's got bonus money for going back to work.
